unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. This year, IIT Madras and IIM Ahmedabad grads are highly sought after. Dr. Sharma's team is visiting Delhi in November. Recruitment focuses on STEM skills. We are offering Rs. 8 Lakhs package, plus benefits. Our new Bangalore office has 5000 sq ft space. Good luck to all applicants! Applications close on 30th Oct.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. This year, I I T Madras and I I M Ahmedabad grads are highly sought after. Doctor Sharma's team is visiting Delhi in November. Recruitment focuses on S T E M skills. We are offering rupee eight lakhs package, plus benefits. Our new Bangalore office has five thousand square feet space. Good luck to all applicants! Applications close on thirtieth October.
